processing_structure.text: Loop from 1 to the input value (for loop comment present)

advice.text: You are in the coding stage: finish translating the remaining comments into code.
Decide what must happen inside the loop: for each i from 1 to n, check divisibility and update the sum accordingly.
Implement a for loop that tests whether the current i divides n evenly and adds i to sum when true, then print the sum after the loop.
